title: Interactive Order System, Admin Panel & Customer Feedback

requirements.text: Add an interactive order placement system to the website. On the ProductShowcase or a dedicated Order section, customers can fill out a form with: their name, phone number, delivery address, product selection (from available products), and quantity. On submission, the order is stored in the backend with a timestamp and a default status of 'Pending'.

quotes: Interactive Order System — Customers can place orders with their name, phone, delivery address, product selection & quantity.

acceptanceCriteria: An order form is accessible from the product showcase section (e.g., via 'Place Order' button on each ProductCard or a dedicated section).
The form collects: customer name, phone number, delivery address, product name/selection, and quantity.
Submitted orders are persisted in the backend with a unique ID, timestamp, and 'Pending' status.
The customer sees a success confirmation after placing an order.
The form validates required fields before submission.

requirements.text: Build a password-protected admin panel accessible via a dedicated route (e.g., /admin). The admin must enter a hardcoded password to gain access. Once logged in, the admin can: (1) view, add, edit, and delete products (name, description, price, stock quantity, image URL/path, category); (2) view and update order statuses (Pending, Processing, Shipped, Delivered, Cancelled); (3) view all customer feedback messages submitted via the contact/feedback form.

quotes: Admin Panel (password-protected) — Secure login to add/edit products, update prices, manage stock levels, and view/manage incoming orders.

acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /admin shows a password entry screen; correct password grants access, wrong password shows an error.
Admin panel has tabbed or sectioned navigation: Products, Orders, Feedback.
Products tab: displays list of all products with options to add a new product, edit existing product fields (name, description, price, stock, image, category), and delete a product.
Orders tab: lists all customer orders with customer details, product, quantity, timestamp, and a dropdown/button to update the order status.
Feedback tab: lists all customer feedback/contact messages with sender name, email, message, and timestamp.
Admin session persists for the browser session (e.g., via localStorage flag) so the admin does not need to re-enter the password on page refresh.
The admin panel is not linked from the public-facing navigation.

requirements.text: Replace the existing contact form's purpose with a dual-purpose Customer Feedback & Contact form. The form collects the customer's name, email, and a message/feedback. Submissions are stored in the backend and are viewable in the admin panel's Feedback tab. Display the contact email vanshita310@gmail.com prominently in the ContactSection alongside the form.

quotes: for 3 i would like my customers to leave feedbacks in form of messAGES
Customer Feedback/Messages — The contact form will let customers leave feedback messages (stored in the backend), and the admin panel will display all received messages.
Contact email — vanshita310@gmail.com added to the contact section.

acceptanceCriteria: The ContactSection/ContactForm collects name, email, and message fields and labels the form as 'Leave Feedback' or 'Send Us a Message'.
Submitted feedback messages are stored in the backend with sender name, email, message text, and timestamp.
The ContactSection displays vanshita310@gmail.com as the business contact email.
All submitted feedback messages appear in the admin panel's Feedback tab.
The existing backend submitContactForm method (or an equivalent) is used or extended to store feedback.

requirements.text: Extend the backend Motoko actor to support the new data models and operations: (1) Products — stored with id, name, description, price, stockQuantity, imageUrl, category; CRUD operations; (2) Orders — stored with id, customerName, phone, address, productId, quantity, status, timestamp; create and list/update-status operations; (3) Feedback/Contact messages — already partially present, ensure the existing messages store is reused and admin list operation is available.

quotes: add products edit prices show stocks of products
customers to leave feedbacks in form of messAGES

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes addProduct, editProduct, deleteProduct, listProducts, getProduct methods.
Backend exposes placeOrder, listOrders, updateOrderStatus methods.
Backend exposes submitFeedback (or reuses submitContactForm), listFeedback methods.
All data structures persist across canister upgrades (stable variables).
Each method returns an appropriate result or error variant.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui/.
The admin panel password can be hardcoded for now; no Internet Identity authentication is required for admin access.
All backend logic must remain in the single backend/main.mo actor.
Existing pink/purple color theme must be preserved across all new UI components.
nonGoals: Email notifications to vanshita310@gmail.com on new orders or messages.
Real-time order status updates via WebSockets.
Customer accounts or login for customers.
Changing the existing visual theme or color palette.
